product_overview: Parzello Tech Website is a landing page platform featuring a portfolio showcase, blog system, team information, and newsletter subscription designed to promote Parzello Tech online.
core_goals: Provide a visually appealing and informative landing page for Parzello Tech.
Showcase featured projects and company team to engage visitors.
Offer a blog system to publish and share company news and articles.
Enable newsletter subscription integration for continuous engagement.
Ensure secure access to protected content with route guarding.
Optimize website for SEO and social media sharing to increase visibility.
key_features: Home Page: Displays featured projects, blog posts, team section, and a newsletter subscription form integrated with Mailchimp.
About Page: Includes company introduction, work experience, educational background, and technical skills with a navigable table of contents.
Blog System: MDX-based posts with listing, individual post pages, social sharing options, and RSS feed support.
Work/Projects Section: Detailed project showcase with listings and individual project details.
Gallery: Photo grid display for visual content presentation.
Route Guard: Password protection for sensitive content pages.
Header & Footer Components: Navigation menu, theme toggling, location display, social links, and copyright info.
Theme Toggle: Dark and light mode switch with system preference auto-detection.
OG Image Generation: API to create social media friendly preview images.
SEO & Metadata: Automated metadata creation, schema markup, sitemap, and robots.txt.
Smooth Scroll to Hash Anchors: Enhances user navigation experience.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Home Page to explore featured projects, recent blogs, and team info.
User navigates to the About Page to learn more about the companyâ€™s background and skills.
User browses the Blog section to read articles and shares posts via social platforms.
User visits the Work or Projects section to view detailed project information.
User subscribes to the newsletter via Mailchimp integration to receive updates.
Protected routes request password authentication before access.
User toggles site theme between dark and light modes according to preference.
SEO mechanisms ensure pages are properly indexed and shareable on social media.
validation_criteria: All pages load correctly on modern browsers and devices with responsive design.
Blog posts render accurately with all markdown/MDX elements and social sharing features.
Newsletter subscription communicates successfully with Mailchimp API and handles errors gracefully.
Password-protected routes restrict access unless authenticated.
Theme toggle persists user preference and follows system defaults initially.
SEO metadata including OG images, sitemap, and schema markup must be present and valid.
API endpoints for OG image generation, RSS feeds, and authentication return correct data and handle failures appropriately.
Smooth scrolling to sections via hash links functions without jank or broken behavior.
